favourite.article: Written in Sept., 1899. "The helpful testimony of another of God's children, and my own deep need of restfulness in Him led me to the truth as expressed in ' My Home is God'" (Author's MS.). It is the most extensively used of the Author's leaflets. - John Julian Dictionary of Hymnology 1907
O holy place! O home divinely fair! And we, God's little ones, abiding there. Oh what a wonderful incorporation with the infinite God to finite man.
It transports us to the heavenlies. it gives us a glimpse of the amazing love of God, touches the soul, and spirit.
